description: Hides the file extension through modification of the registry
name: Registry Modification to Hidden File Extension
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\Advanced\\HideFileExt AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)") OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\Advanced\\Hidden AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000002\)")))
author: frack113
